positions.title: Adjunct Professor

educations.title: Padma Seshadri Bala Bhavan, Chennai, India

given.text:
I worked with Sriram as a Product Manager while he was in a leadership position at RSG.
Sriram has exceptional leadership skills that are key to leading big corporate and academic projects. He has one of the sharpest minds at work when it comes to quantitative analysis and is never shy of rolling up his sleeves, sign of a great leader, to lead the way for his team members.
I would recommend Sriram for a leadership position that requires exceptional skill set in the area of Big Data Analytics and people management. See less

received.text:
Madhukar is a talented analyst with a strong statistical data analysis and model building skills. He worked with me on several key projects and has been quick to grasp the problem and implement solutions in an efficient and timely fashion. He is also an excellent team player, always collegial, helpful and dependable. I recommend him highly.

... See more

Kshitiz is an extremely talented individual who has significant all-round skills. He is a very smart technologist, who can quickly understand the functional requirements, architect the system, creatively solve any problems and develop efficient code. He is also a good manager and mentor and has earned the trust of those within the organization and the trust of our clients. He is a vital contributor in all our analytics solutions and has played an important part in development and successful roll out to several major media clients. He is definitely a very valuable player in our team.
